translated: The Worthy One, the Well-gone One in the world,
the sage is afflicted by wind.

analyzed: muninaḥ dehi brāhmaṇa  pūjito  sakkareyyāna sakkato
translated: give it to the sage, brahmin. 🔽Honored by those worthy of honor, 🔽respected by those worthy of respect,
extolled by those worthy of praise,
I wish to remove his affliction.”
